Name: amd
Overview: Automated Music Downloader :: AMD is a Lidarr Companion script to automatically download and tag music files for use in various media applications

Enable Automatic Script Start.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
Enable Automatic Script Start.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Script Interval.Name: Script Interval
Script Interval.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

Lidarr Url.Name: Lidarr Url
Lidarr Url.Description: Set domain or IP to your Lidarr instance including port. If using reverse proxy, do not use a trailing slash. Ensure you specify http/s.

Lidarr Remote Path Mapping.Name: Lidarr Remote Path Mapping
Lidarr Remote Path Mapping.Description: OPTIONAL :: ADVANCED FEATURE :: Configure this to the local volume path for Lidarr to see the downloads folder, this will enable file moves, instead of copies... Less resource intensive

Music Download Client ARL Token.Name: Music Download Client ARL Token
Music Download Client ARL Token.Description: User token for dl client, for instructions to obtain token: https://notabug.org/RemixDevs/DeezloaderRemix/wiki/Login+via+userToken

Music Download Mode.Name: Music Download Mode
Music Download Mode.Description: wanted or artist :: wanted mode only download missing/cutoff :: artist mode downloads all albums by an artist (requires lidarr volume mapping root media folders for import)

Music Album Type Filter.Name: Music Album Type Filter
Music Album Type Filter.Description: Filter Types: COMPILE, SINGLE, ALBUM, EP (this is a ', ' separated list of Album Types to skip) (artist mode only)

Music List Type.Name: Music List Type
Music List Type.Description: both or missing or cutoff :: both = missing + cutoff :: missng = lidarr missing list :: cutoff = lidarr cutoff li

Music Search Type.Name: Music Search Type
Music Search Type.Description: both or artist or fuzzy :: both = artist + fuzzy searching :: artist = only artist searching :: fuzzy = only fuzzy searching (Various Artist is always fuzzy searched, regardless of setting)

Music Post Process Threads.Name: Music Post Process Threads
Music Post Process Threads.Description: Controls number of threads used for Format conversion and replaygain tagging

Music Embedded Cover Quality.Name: Music Embedded Cover Quality
Music Embedded Cover Quality.Description: Controls the quality of the cover image compression in percentage, 100 = no compression

Music Download Format.Name: Music Download Format
Music Download Format.Description: FLAC or MP3 or OPUS or AAC or ALAC

Music Download Bitrate.Name: Music Download Bitrate
Music Download Bitrate.Description: FLAC -> OPUS/AAC/MP3 will be converted using this bitrate (MP3 320/128 is native, not converted)

Music Force Convert.Name: Music Force Convert
Music Force Convert.Description: true = enabled :: This will convert lossy MP3 to desired target format (exluding FLAC/ALAC, ALAC setting will convert to AAC)

Music Require Quality.Name: Music Require Quality
Music Require Quality.Description: true = enabled :: Requires all downloaded files match target file extension (mp3 or flac) when enabled

Music Replaygain Tagging.Name: Music Replaygain Tagging
Music Replaygain Tagging.Description: true = enabled :: true = enabled :: Scans and analyzes files to add replaygain tags to song metadata

Music Match Distance.Name: Music Match Distance
Music Match Distance.Description: Set as an integer, the higher the number, the more lienet it is. Example: A match score of 0 is a perfect match :: For more information, this score is produced using this function: https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Algorithm_Implementation/Strings/Levenshtein_distance

Musicbrainz Mirror URL.Name: Musicbrainz Mirror URL
Musicbrainz Mirror URL.Description: OPTIONAL: Only change if using a different mirror

Musicbrainz Rate Limit.Name: Musicbrainz Rate Limit
Musicbrainz Rate Limit.Description: OPTIONAL: musicbrainz rate limit, musicbrainz allows only 1 connection per second, max setting is 10 :: Set to 101 to disable limit

Plex Scan Notifications.Name: Plex Scan Notifications
Plex Scan Notifications.Description: true = enabled :: Plex must have a Music library added and also be configured with the /downloads-ama directory

Plex Library Name.Name: Plex Library Name
Plex Library Name.Description: This must exactly match the name of the Plex Library that contains the Lidarr Media Folder data

Plex Url.Name: Plex Url
Plex Url.Description: ONLY used if NOTIFYPLEX is enabled...

Plex Token.Name: Plex Token
Plex Token.Description: ONLY used if NOTIFYPLEX is enabled...

Host Path for /downloads-amd.Name: Host Path for /downloads-amd
Host Path for /downloads-amd.Description: Container Path: /downloads-amd (DO NOT DELETE) :: !!!!IMPORTANT!!! Map this exact volume mount to your Lidarr Container for everything to work properly!!!
